Text: anyone know where to find criznittles lists? had most of his 08 lists- but HD failure has left them in doubt. havent seen anything from him in ages.

Criz is back! Just search for criznittle here or indie rock playlist and you'll find him. Or use scrapetorrent. (it's a BT search engine) As far as the old torrents go, I'm not sure they are around. I bet some are on BT and maybe even some of the older file sharing networks. They USED to all still be on Mininova. :(  But not anymore. You might try Demonoid.
